Name: Husbandry
About the game: As an entrepreneur from a far away galaxy, raise and breed the exotic creatures of Earth, then sell them back to your home world. Features Unlock all kinds of animals. Breed over 1,000,000 unique animal combinations. Take care of your animals so they can grow up and make babies. If you don't take care of your animals, they just might die.
